title: Senior Mobile Developer
description: Join our technology team to build and enhance our mobile applications that serve thousands of users across Botswana. You'll work on React Native apps, implement new features, and ensure optimal performance.
requirements: 5+ years of mobile development experience
Strong proficiency in React Native and JavaScript/TypeScript
Experience with native iOS and Android development
Knowledge of RESTful APIs and mobile app architecture
Experience with Git, CI/CD, and agile development practices
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android
Collaborate with designers and backend developers
Implement new features and optimize app performance
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
Mentor junior developers and contribute to team growth
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Annual team retreats and company events

title: Customer Success Specialist

requirements: 2+ years of customer service or support experience
Excellent communication skills in English and Setswana
Problem-solving mindset and patience
Experience with CRM systems and support tools
Understanding of the local market and culture
Diploma or degree in Business, Communications, or related field
responsibilities: Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat
Resolve customer issues and escalate complex cases
Maintain customer satisfaction and retention
Document customer feedback and suggest improvements
Collaborate with other teams to enhance user experience
Conduct customer onboarding and training sessions

Knowledge of social media platforms and digital advertising
Basic understanding of SEO and content marketing
Creative thinking and attention to detail
Proficiency in design tools (Canva, Photoshop) is a plus
Diploma in Marketing, Communications, or related field

Write blog posts and marketing copy

title: Fleet Operations Manager

requirements: 5+ years of fleet or operations management experience
Strong understanding of vehicle maintenance and logistics
Leadership and team management skills
Knowledge of local regulations and compliance requirements
Data analysis and reporting capabilities
Bachelor's degree in Operations, Business, or related field
responsibilities: Manage fleet operations and vehicle availability
Coordinate vehicle maintenance and repairs
Optimize vehicle distribution and utilization
Lead and develop the local operations team
Ensure compliance with safety and regulatory standards
Analyze operational data and implement improvements
benefits: Annual performance reviews and career progression

Statistical analysis and modeling skills
Understanding of business metrics and KPIs
Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
responsibilities: Analyze user behavior and operational data
Create dashboards and reports for stakeholders
Identify trends and insights to support business decisions
Collaborate with product and operations teams
Develop predictive models and forecasts
Ensure data quality and integrity
